quiz.question: other-directed ___________
quiz.explanation: 他人导向的，他人导向的人格。People with an other-directed personality are influenced by external social pressures. 拥有他人导向的人格的人受外部社会压力的影响。

quiz.question: undirected _____
quiz.explanation: 无向的，无向图。An undirected graph has edges with no direction. 无向图的边没有方向。

quiz.question: blighted _____
quiz.explanation: 破灭的，破灭的希望。The economic crisis led to blighted hopes for many families. 经济危机导致许多家庭破灭的希望。

quiz.question: ____ discomfited
quiz.explanation: 尴尬的，看起来尴尬。She would look discomfited when caught in a lie. 当谎言被揭穿时，她会看起来尴尬。

quiz.question: merited ______
quiz.explanation: 应得的，应得的赞扬。His hard work received merited praise from the manager. 他的辛勤工作得到了经理应得的赞扬。

quiz.question: unrequited ____
quiz.explanation: 单恋的，单恋的爱。He suffered from unrequited love for years. 他遭受了多年的单恋的爱。

quiz.question: stilted _____
quiz.explanation: 生硬的，生硬的散文。The novelist's stilted prose was difficult to read. 小说家生硬的散文难以阅读。

quiz.question: warranted ______
quiz.explanation: 有正当理由的，有正当理由的行动。The emergency situation called for warranted action. 紧急情况需要有正当理由的行动。

quiz.question: unwarranted _____
quiz.explanation: 无根据的，无根据的声明。The lawsuit was based on an unwarranted claim. 诉讼基于无根据的声明。

quiz.question: unscented ______
quiz.explanation: 无香味的，无香味的乳液。She preferred unscented lotion for sensitive skin. 她更喜欢敏感皮肤用的无香味的乳液。

quiz.question: unprecedented ____
quiz.explanation: 史无前例的，史无前例的举动。The company made an unprecedented move to cut prices. 公司做出了史无前例的举动降低价格。

quiz.question: demented ____
quiz.explanation: 疯狂的，疯狂的咆哮。His demented rant scared everyone in the room. 他疯狂的咆哮吓坏了房间里的每个人。

quiz.question: ____ contented
quiz.explanation: 满足的，感到满足。After the meal, everyone would feel contented. 用餐后，每个人都会感到满足。

quiz.question: __ acquainted ____
quiz.explanation: 熟悉的，熟悉。I need to be acquainted with the new procedures. 我需要熟悉新程序。

quiz.question: unwonted ________
quiz.explanation: 不寻常的，不寻常的善意。His unwonted kindness surprised everyone. 他不寻常的善意让每个人都感到惊讶。

quiz.question: devoted ___
quiz.explanation: 忠诚的，忠诚的粉丝。She was a devoted fan of the band. 她是乐队的忠诚的粉丝。

quiz.question: halfhearted _______
quiz.explanation: 三心二意的，三心二意的尝试。His halfhearted attempt failed predictably. 他三心二意的尝试可预见地失败了。

quiz.question: fainthearted ________
quiz.explanation: 胆怯的，胆怯的方法。The fainthearted approach would not succeed. 胆怯的方法不会成功。

quiz.question: stouthearted ____
quiz.explanation: 勇敢的，勇敢的英雄。The stouthearted hero rescued the child from the fire. 勇敢的英雄从火中救出了孩子。

quiz.question: deserted ______
quiz.explanation: 荒芜的，荒芜的岛屿。They were stranded on a deserted island. 他们被困在荒芜的岛屿上。

quiz.question: purported ________
quiz.explanation: 声称的，声称的证据。The purported evidence was never verified. 声称的证据从未得到验证。

quiz.question: assorted ______
quiz.explanation: 各种各样的，各种各样的零食。The party had assorted snacks for guests. 派对为客人准备了各种各样的零食。

quiz.question: disinterested ______
quiz.explanation: 公正的，公正的建议。The mediator provided disinterested advice. 调解员提供了公正的建议。

quiz.question: tightfisted _____
quiz.explanation: 吝啬的，吝啬的守财奴。The tightfisted miser never spent money. 吝啬的守财奴从不花钱。

quiz.question: committed ____
quiz.explanation: 尽心尽力的，尽心尽力的团队。The committed team worked overtime to finish. 尽心尽力的团队加班完成工作。

quiz.question: ______ uncommitted
quiz.explanation: 未承诺的，保持未承诺。The voters chose to remain uncommitted. 选民选择保持未承诺。

quiz.question: unspotted ______
quiz.explanation: 清白的，清白的记录。He maintained an unspotted record throughout his career. 他在整个职业生涯中保持了清白的记录。

quiz.question: convoluted ____
quiz.explanation: 复杂的，复杂的情节。The movie had a convoluted plot that was hard to follow. 这部电影有复杂的情节难以理解。

quiz.question: muted _____
quiz.explanation: 柔和的，柔和的颜色。The room was decorated in muted color. 房间用柔和的颜色装饰。

quiz.question: subdued ____
quiz.explanation: 低沉的，低沉的语气。She spoke in a subdued tone. 她用低沉的语气说话。

quiz.question: depraved ___
quiz.explanation: 堕落的，堕落的行为。The criminal committed a depraved act. 罪犯犯下了堕落的行为。

quiz.question: ____ relieved
quiz.explanation: 放心的，感到放心。She would feel relieved when the exam was over. 当考试结束时，她会感到放心。

quiz.question: contrived ____
quiz.explanation: 牵强的，牵强的情节。The novel's contrived plot lacked authenticity. 小说牵强的情节缺乏真实性。

quiz.question: ______ unmoved
quiz.explanation: 无动于衷的，保持无动于衷。He would remain unmoved by her tears. 他会对她的眼泪保持无动于衷。

quiz.question: undeserved ______
quiz.explanation: 不应得的，不应得的赞扬。The politician received undeserved praise. 政客得到了不应得的赞扬。

quiz.question: unreserved _______
quiz.explanation: 无保留的，无保留的支持。The team gave unreserved support to their captain. 球队给予队长无保留的支持。

quiz.question: hallowed ______
quiz.explanation: 神圣的，神圣的土地。The cemetery was hallowed ground. 墓地是神圣的土地。

quiz.question: hackneyed ______
quiz.explanation: 陈腐的，陈腐的短语。The speaker used a hackneyed phrase. 演讲者使用了陈腐的短语。

quiz.question: specialized ________
quiz.explanation: 专业的，专业的培训。The job requires specialized training. 这份工作需要专业的培训。

quiz.question: institutionalized ______
quiz.explanation: 制度化的，制度化的种族主义。The country struggled with institutionalized racism. 该国与制度化的种族主义作斗争。

quiz.question: underutilized ______
quiz.explanation: 未充分利用的，未充分利用的资产。The company had underutilized assets. 公司有未充分利用的资产。

quiz.question: ______ mermaid
quiz.explanation: 美人鱼，小美人鱼。The fairy tale was about a little mermaid. 这个童话讲述了一个小美人鱼。

quiz.question: ______ raid
quiz.explanation: 突袭，警察突袭。The police raid uncovered illegal weapons. 警察突袭发现了非法武器。

quiz.question: upbraid ________
quiz.explanation: 责备，严厉责备。The teacher would upbraid severely the misbehaving student. 老师会严厉责备行为不端的学生。

quiz.question: staid _________
quiz.explanation: 稳重的，稳重的性格。He had a staid character that never changed. 他有从不改变的稳重的性格。

quiz.question: rabid ___
quiz.explanation: 狂热的，狂热的粉丝。He was a rabid fan of the sports team. 他是体育队的狂热的粉丝。

quiz.question: underbid _ _____
quiz.explanation: 出价低于，出价低于对手。The company tried to underbid a rival for the contract. 公司试图在合同上出价低于对手。

quiz.question: forbid _____
quiz.explanation: 禁止，禁止进入。The sign would forbid entry to unauthorized personnel. 标志会禁止进入未经授权的人员。

quiz.question: morbid _________
quiz.explanation: 病态的，病态的好奇心。She had a morbid curiosity about death. 她对死亡有病态的好奇心。

quiz.question: placid ____
quiz.explanation: 平静的，平静的湖。The placid lake reflected the mountains perfectly. 平静的湖完美地倒映着山脉。

quiz.question: viscid ______
quiz.explanation: 粘稠的，粘稠的液体。The viscid liquid was difficult to pour. 粘稠的液体难以倾倒。

quiz.question: pellucid _____
quiz.explanation: 清澈的，清澈的水。The mountain stream had pellucid water. 山溪有清澈的水。

quiz.question: candid _____
quiz.explanation: 自然的，自然的照片。The photographer took candid photo at the wedding. 摄影师在婚礼上拍摄了自然的照片。

quiz.question: sordid ______
quiz.explanation: 肮脏的，肮脏的事件。The scandal revealed a sordid affair. 丑闻揭露了肮脏的事件。

quiz.question: rigid _____
quiz.explanation: 严格的，严格的规则。The school had rigid rules about uniforms. 学校有关于制服的严格的规则。

quiz.question: frigid _______
quiz.explanation: 寒冷的，寒冷的气候。Antarctica has a frigid climate year-round. 南极洲全年都有寒冷的气候。

quiz.question: turgid _____
quiz.explanation: 浮夸的，浮夸的散文。The writer's turgid prose was hard to read. 作家浮夸的散文难以阅读。

quiz.question: orchid ______
quiz.explanation: 兰花，兰花园。The botanical orchid garden displayed rare species. 植物兰花园展示了稀有物种。

quiz.question: squalid __________
quiz.explanation: 肮脏的，肮脏的环境。The refugees lived in squalid conditions. 难民生活在肮脏的环境中。

quiz.question: stolid __________
quiz.explanation: 木然的，木然的表情。He maintained a stolid expression during the trial. 他在审判期间保持木然的表情。

quiz.question: humid _______
quiz.explanation: 潮湿的，潮湿的气候。The tropical region has a humid climate. 热带地区有潮湿的气候。

quiz.question: tumid _____
quiz.explanation: 肿胀的，肿胀的河流。Heavy rains caused the tumid river to overflow. 大雨导致肿胀的河流溢出。

quiz.question: _____-______ arachnid
quiz.explanation: 蛛形纲动物，八条腿的蛛形纲动物。Spiders are eight-legged arachnid creatures. 蜘蛛是八条腿的蛛形纲动物生物。

quiz.question: anthropoid ___
quiz.explanation: 类人的，类人猿。Gorillas are anthropoid ape species. 大猩猩是类人猿物种。

quiz.question: asteroid ____
quiz.explanation: 小行星，小行星带。The asteroid belt lies between Mars and Jupiter. 小行星带位于火星和木星之间。

quiz.question: _______ sangfroid
quiz.explanation: 沉着，展现沉着。The pilot would display sangfroid during the emergency. 飞行员会在紧急情况下展现沉着。

quiz.question: intrepid ________
quiz.explanation: 无畏的，无畏的探险家。The intrepid explorer ventured into unknown territory. 无畏的探险家冒险进入未知领域。

quiz.question: tepid ________
quiz.explanation: 冷淡的，冷淡的反应。The proposal received a tepid response. 该提案得到了冷淡的反应。

quiz.question: insipid ____
quiz.explanation: 乏味的，乏味的汤。The insipid soup lacked flavor. 乏味的汤缺乏味道。

quiz.question: limpid ______
quiz.explanation: 清澈的，清澈的溪流。The limpid stream flowed through the meadow. 清澈的溪流流过草地。

quiz.question: arid ______
quiz.explanation: 干旱的，干旱的沙漠。The arid desert received little rainfall. 干旱的沙漠很少降雨。

quiz.question: hybrid _______
quiz.explanation: 混合动力的，混合动力的车辆。The hybrid vehicle uses both gas and electricity. 混合动力的车辆同时使用汽油和电力。

quiz.question: florid _____
quiz.explanation: 华丽的，华丽的散文。The author's florid prose was overly decorative. 作者华丽的散文过于华丽。

quiz.question: torrid _______
quiz.explanation: 炽热的，炽热的恋情。They had a torrid romance that summer. 那年夏天他们有炽热的恋情。

quiz.question: fetid ____
quiz.explanation: 恶臭的，恶臭的气味。A fetid odor came from the garbage. 垃圾发出恶臭的气味。

quiz.question: languid _________
quiz.explanation: 慵懒的，慵懒的午后。They spent a languid afternoon by the pool. 他们在泳池边度过了慵懒的午后。

quiz.question: liquid ______
quiz.explanation: 流动的，流动资产。The company had plenty of liquid assets. 公司有充足的流动资产。

quiz.question: fervid ______
quiz.explanation: 热烈的，热烈的辩论。The politicians engaged in fervid debate. 政客们进行了热烈的辩论。

quiz.question: perfervid ____
quiz.explanation: 极度热情的，极度热情的热忱。His perfervid zeal for the cause was inspiring. 他对事业的极度热情的热忱令人鼓舞。

quiz.question: piebald ____
quiz.explanation: 花斑的，花斑的小马。The children loved the piebald pony. 孩子们喜欢花斑的小马。

quiz.question: ribald ____
quiz.explanation: 粗俗的，粗俗的笑话。He told a ribald joke that embarrassed everyone. 他讲了一个粗俗的笑话让每个人都很尴尬。

quiz.question: _____ shield
quiz.explanation: 盾牌，防爆盾牌。The soldiers used a blast shield for protection. 士兵们使用防爆盾牌保护。

quiz.question: wield _____
quiz.explanation: 行使，行使权力。The king would wield power over his subjects. 国王会对臣民行使权力。

quiz.question: meld ________
quiz.explanation: 融合，融合在一起。The cultures would meld together over time. 文化会随着时间融合在一起。

quiz.question: weld ____
quiz.explanation: 焊接，焊接接缝。The worker would weld seam on the metal pipe. 工人会焊接金属管上的接缝。

quiz.question: fold ___ _______
quiz.explanation: 折叠，折叠衣服。Please fold the clothes after they dry. 衣服干了之后请折叠衣服。

quiz.question: scaffold ________
quiz.explanation: 脚手架，脚手架平台。Workers stood on the scaffold platform. 工人们站在脚手架平台上。

quiz.question: manifold ________
quiz.explanation: 多种多样的，多种多样的好处。Exercise has manifold benefits for health. 运动对健康有多种多样的好处。

quiz.question: behold ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 看见，看见风景。Climb the tower to behold the view. 爬上塔楼看见风景。

quiz.question: withhold _______
quiz.explanation: 扣留，扣留付款。The client decided to withhold payment until completion. 客户决定在完成之前扣留付款。

quiz.question: ____ _ foothold
quiz.explanation: 立足点，获得立足点。The company tried to gain a foothold in the market. 公司试图在市场上获得立足点。

quiz.question: mold ______
quiz.explanation: 霉菌，霉菌生长。Damp conditions caused mold growth on the walls. 潮湿的条件导致墙上霉菌生长。

quiz.question: contraband _____
quiz.explanation: 违禁品，违禁品货物。Customs officials seized contraband goods. 海关官员查获了违禁品货物。

quiz.question: disband _ _____
quiz.explanation: 解散，解散团体。The organization decided to disband a group. 该组织决定解散团体。

quiz.question: bland ____
quiz.explanation: 清淡的，清淡的饮食。The doctor recommended a bland diet after surgery. 医生建议手术后清淡的饮食。

quiz.question: ______ garland
quiz.explanation: 花环，花环。The bride wore a beautiful flower garland. 新娘戴着美丽的花环。

quiz.question: ______ hinterland
quiz.explanation: 内陆，偏远的内陆。They explored the remote hinterland. 他们探索了偏远的内陆。

quiz.question: ____ demand
quiz.explanation: 需求，满足需求。The factory struggled to meet demand. 工厂努力满足需求。

quiz.question: _____ reprimand
quiz.explanation: 训斥，严厉的训斥。The manager issued a stern reprimand. 经理发出了严厉的训斥。

quiz.question: countermand _____
quiz.explanation: 撤销，撤销命令。The general decided to countermand order. 将军决定撤销命令。
